column4: could anybody recommend which internal laptop wifi chipset I should go for??
have you tried using the kernel module?
802.11b only
wireless B - only goes up to 11mbit
bcm43xx kernel module doesn't appear to support g
you are in feisty i assume?
yes
what model do you have?
i have a 4309, and its so bad it makes ndiswrapper panic my kernel when i try and load it...  the closest bcm43xx + fwcutter gets me a 4306 driver
and i can't get g from it...
i think u need a newer kernel, when and if you upgrade to gutsy you shold be in better shape
newer kernel? why?
new kernel, newer bcm43xx driver
same firmware though....
mine was at 11mbits in feisty, and 54mbits in gutsy
oh, i see....  I'll try that then!
is it safe to upgrade to the RC yet?
it runs fine
if i have the opportunity, am i better off doing a clean install of gutsy?
... i can only find DVDs for the RC...
check other mirrors, i dont rememebr where i got it but i found a cd
